main event: A bright, glowing red object was observed hovering over East Danville, Illinois on December 8, 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as being 3-4 times the size of a star, moving erratically from southwest to northwest.
The object did not make any sound and disappeared to the northwest.
The object seemed to have no defined edges or visible details.
The visibility was reported as good, with a bright moon.
